column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Fantastic food and great service! I recently held a dinner here for 7 friends
column2: and Caf√©-Ba-Ba-Reeba did not disappoint. Our waitress advised us to order about two tapas per person
column3: which ended up being the perfect amount. We each ordered something and passed it around so we all got a bite. Some of our group had never done tapas before and loved the variety of dishes everyone gets a chance to try. And don't leave with out trying the sangria
column4: very good! I would definitely recommend as a fun option for groups.
